column4: Cell type $x_i$ has the effect $\alpha_{jc_ix_i}$; for identifiability, $\alpha_{jc_ix_i} = 0$ if $x_i = 1$
column5: One intercept for each cell type

column4: $b_{jc_ik}(\cdot)$ is a basis function of cubic spline; $K$ is the dimension of the basis
$b_{jc_ilk}(\cdot)$ is a basis function of cubic spline; $K$ is the the dimension of the basis (default $K=10$)
column6: mu_formula = "s(pseudotime1, k = 10, by = l1, bs = 'cr') + s(pseudotime2, k = 10, by = l2, bs = 'cr')", $p = 2$ in this case

column4: $f_{jc_i}^{\operatorname{GP}}(\cdot, \cdot, K)$ is a Gaussian process smoother; $K$ is the dimension of the basis (default $K=400$)
